name: International Melon Service
description:
You are a ninja frog by the name of Phrouge. You accidentally spend all of your money on frogettes and pondwater, only to realize that it's tax season! The IRS are now hunting you down, and you can't pay your taxes. Lucky for you, local melon farmer Ephun needs help with his harvest, and is willing to pay you. Can you collect enough melons to pay off the IRS? Or perhaps find the secret escape route to Bermuda?

(For SERIOUS gamers only)

(Also this game is really bad, we're aware)
